page.title: 03THE WATLING STREET (A5)
page.content: The A5 or Watling Street begins in London and finishes in Holyhead, North Wales.It is 397 miles long.The Watling Street was built by the Romans. It is a busy trunk road,in some parts dual carriageway but mostly three lane road.The speed limit on the road through Grendon is 50mph. The quietest time of the day for traffic is between 2am. and 5am.The busiest time is between 5pm. and 6pm. particularly on a Friday. We counted the traffic on a Wednesday morning at 11am.In one hour we counted as follows:- NORTHBOUND * SOUTHBOUND CYCLE > .....0..... * .....3.... MOTORCYCLE> .....6..... * .....4.... CAR > ...303..... * ...268.... VAN/TRUCK > ....63..... * ....56.... LORRY > ...132..... * ....68.... BUS > .....6..... * .....4....
